c74object.name: fl.nanfilter~
c74object.digest: Replaces or removes NaNs in a vector.
c74object.description: Replaces or removes NaNs in a vector

entry.name: 0. /mode [enum]
entry.description:
Set whether to replace or remove NaN values
[0] - replace [1] - remove

entry.name: 1. /value [double]
entry.description: Set the value with which to replace NaN values
